member.name: SOCKET_PROCESSOR_AFFINITY
member.summary: The SOCKET_PROCESSOR_AFFINITY structure contains the association between a socket and an RSS processor core and NUMA node..

member.name: SOCKET_PROCESSOR_AFFINITY.Processor
member.summary: A structure to represent a system wide processor number. This structure contains a group number and relative processor number within the group.

member.name: SOCKET_PROCESSOR_AFFINITY.Reserved
member.summary: A value reserved for future use.
